osyfe.graphic

Class Rendable<T extends Rendable<?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • osyfe.graphic.Rendable<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Deletable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Mesh, Model

    public abstract class Rendable<T extends Rendable<?>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Deletable
    Unifies rendable objects (mesh and model) with uniform utilities. The uniforms assigned will be set automatically before each rendering process if a shader is given. The names are as appearing in the shader code.

      Rendable()

        public T uniformXf(java.lang.String name,
                   float[] v)
        float/vecX uniform. It is sensible to value changes.

      • uniformXf

        public T uniformXf(java.lang.String name,
                   int x,
                   java.util.function.Consumer<float[]> fX)
        float/vecX uniform. The consumer will be called before each rendering process in order to set the array values.

      • uniformXi

        public T uniformXi(java.lang.String name,
                   int[] v)
        int/ivecX uniform. It is sensible to value changes.

        int/ivecX uniform. The consumer will be called before each rendering process in order to set the array values.
